name: Plastic Bag
three_r_tip: Reuse multiple times. Reduce single-use bags. Recycle in designated bins.
disposal: Plastic recycling bin or special collection points.
handling_precautions: Do not litter; keep away from animals.

name: Water Bottle
three_r_tip: Reuse bottles. Reduce single-use. Recycle PET bottles.
disposal: Plastic recycling bin or bottle deposit points.
handling_precautions: Do not use if cracked; wash before reuse.

name: Glass Bottle
three_r_tip: Reuse bottles. Reduce single-use. Recycle glass properly.
disposal: Glass recycling bin; separate by color if required.

name: Aluminum Can
three_r_tip: Rinse and recycle. Reduce consumption. Reuse creatively.
disposal: Metal recycling bin; rinse before disposal.

name: Tin Can
three_r_tip: Rinse and recycle. Reduce canned food use. Reuse for storage.

name: Battery AA
three_r_tip: Use rechargeable batteries. Recycle at collection centers.
disposal: Battery collection point; do not throw in trash.

name: Battery AAA
three_r_tip: Use rechargeable batteries. Recycle at collection centers.
disposal: Battery collection point; do not throw in trash.

name: Food Waste
three_r_tip: Compost if possible. Reduce leftovers. Feed animals when safe.
disposal: Compost bin or green waste bin.

name: Cereal Box
three_r_tip: Reuse for storage or crafts. Recycle when worn. Reduce packaging.
disposal: Paper recycling bin; remove plastic lining if present.

name: Coffee Cup
three_r_tip: Reuse or compost if possible. Reduce takeaway cups.
disposal: Recycling bin or compost if available.

name: Plastic Straw
three_r_tip: Avoid single-use straws. Reuse if possible. Recycle where accepted.
disposal: Plastic recycling bin if accepted; otherwise general waste.
handling_precautions: Do not litter; keep away from animals.

name: Old Electronics
three_r_tip: Donate if functional. Recycle through e-waste programs.
disposal: E-waste collection center or manufacturer take-back.

name: Styrofoam Container
three_r_tip: Avoid single-use foam. Reduce purchases. Recycle if facility exists.
disposal: Special foam recycling or general waste if not accepted.

name: Light Bulb (Incandescent)
three_r_tip: Replace only when burned out. Recycle at facility if available.
disposal: General waste if no recycling; check local facility.

name: Plastic Toy
three_r_tip: Donate if usable. Recycle if broken. Reduce plastic purchases.
disposal: Plastic recycling bin or general waste if not accepted.

name: Plastic Container
three_r_tip: Reuse containers. Reduce disposable containers. Recycle.

name: Plastic Spoon
three_r_tip: Use reusable utensils. Recycle if accepted. Reduce single-use.

name: Plastic Fork
three_r_tip: Use reusable forks. Recycle if possible. Reduce single-use.

name: Plastic Knife
three_r_tip: Avoid single-use. Reuse or recycle.

name: Plastic Cup
three_r_tip: Use reusable cups. Recycle when worn. Reduce single-use.

name: Plastic Container Lid
three_r_tip: Reuse. Reduce disposable lids. Recycle.

name: Plastic Food Wrapper
three_r_tip: Avoid single-use. Reduce packaging. Recycle if accepted.

name: Milk Carton
three_r_tip: Rinse and recycle. Reduce carton use. Reuse creatively.

name: Newspaper
three_r_tip: Reuse for crafts or packing. Reduce printing. Recycle.

name: Cardboard Box
three_r_tip: Reuse for storage or shipping. Recycle when worn. Reduce packaging.

name: Notebook
three_r_tip: Reuse pages if possible. Recycle when worn.

name: Pen
three_r_tip: Use fully. Refill if possible. Reduce disposable pens.
disposal: General waste or recycling if accepted.

name: Pencil
three_r_tip: Sharpen carefully. Reuse until short. Recycle wood if possible.

name: Eraser
three_r_tip: Use fully. Reduce disposable erasers. Recycle if accepted.

name: Ruler
three_r_tip: Reuse until broken. Recycle if possible.

name: Stapler
three_r_tip: Use fully. Reuse. Recycle metal if broken.

name: Scissors
three_r_tip: Reuse carefully. Recycle metal when broken.

name: Glue Stick
three_r_tip: Use fully. Reduce disposable glue. Recycle plastic.

name: Tape
three_r_tip: Use sparingly. Recycle plastic core.

name: Paper Clips
three_r_tip: Reuse as much as possible. Recycle metal when worn.

name: Binder
three_r_tip: Reuse if functional. Recycle paper when worn.

name: File Folder
three_r_tip: Reuse until worn. Recycle paper.

name: Mobile Phone
three_r_tip: Reduce by keeping longer. Reuse or donate. Recycle through e-waste programs.
handling_precautions: Remove SIM and battery before disposal.

name: Laptop
three_r_tip: Keep for longer. Upgrade components. Recycle at e-waste centers.

name: Tablet
three_r_tip: Reuse if functional. Reduce by sharing. Recycle when broken.

name: Earphones
three_r_tip: Reuse or donate if working. Reduce cheap replacements. Recycle through e-waste programs.
toxicity: Non-toxic but contains wires and plastic.

name: Charger Cable
three_r_tip: Reuse until worn. Reduce by buying high-quality cables. Recycle with electronics.

name: Power Bank
three_r_tip: Keep well-maintained. Reuse. Recycle at e-waste centers.
toxicity: Contains lithium battery; hazardous if punctured.

name: LED Bulb
three_r_tip: Replace only when necessary. Recycle at e-waste centers.

name: Computer Mouse
three_r_tip: Keep functional ones. Reuse or donate. Recycle at electronics facility.

name: Keyboard
three_r_tip: Reuse or donate if working. Reduce by cleaning regularly. Recycle if broken.

name: TV Remote
three_r_tip: Reuse with same device. Reduce by buying universal remote. Recycle when broken.

name: Old TV
three_r_tip: Reduce by repairing. Donate if working. Recycle through take-back.
handling_precautions: Handle with care; avoid crushing CRT screens.

name: Refrigerator
three_r_tip: Maintain to extend lifespan. Recycle via appliance centers.

name: Ceramic Mug
three_r_tip: Reuse indefinitely. Reduce disposable cups. Compost if broken safely.

name: Steel Cup
three_r_tip: Reuse indefinitely. Reduce disposable cups.

name: Wooden Chair
three_r_tip: Reuse or donate. Recycle if broken.
disposal: Wood recycling bin or general waste.

name: Wooden Table
three_r_tip: Reuse or donate. Recycle if broken.
disposal: Wood recycling bin or general waste.

name: Wooden Shelf
three_r_tip: Reuse or donate. Recycle if broken.
disposal: Wood recycling bin or general waste.

name: Plastic Chair
three_r_tip: Reuse or donate. Recycle broken chairs.

name: Plastic Table
three_r_tip: Reuse or donate. Reduce disposable tables. Recycle broken ones.

name: Plastic Soap Dish
three_r_tip: Reuse. Reduce single-use. Recycle if possible.

name: Ceramic Soap Dish
three_r_tip: Reuse. Reduce single-use items.
